About Me

Wanna know about me.?

Bio

Over 8 Years of Experience in software testing efforts for product releases for Info Financial and Health Domain applications. Developed software requirements and test matrixes, modifying software test scope documents used throughout the entire Testing Lifecycle process. Responsible for hiring QA & Development Team members and Mentoring QA Engineer team members.
